constituent: tile, one, ceiling, cane, stick, drop, fishhook, ice
heisigStory: Ceiling . . . plow . . . fishhook . . . a drop of.
koohiiStory1: Horror scene: Hanging from the ceiling, a plough and fishhook dripping with blood down onto the tiled bathroom floor.
koohiiStory2: [true stroke order] First draw T for Tile, which then becomes I. Then draw an ´L´ fish hook with a dash in the middle to make a mediocre ´e´ that few can see.//ガ wa3 와 (wa).
